Text.Page:
The Enlightened Union has noticed a marked change in the energy signature of areas with heavy noctenium concentrations. This has produced a serendipitous side effect.

By utilizing this energy, it appears we can make more powerful weapons.

My friend, please seek out noctenium fluxes, and collect at least three samples of Arunic noctenium energy from them.
This energy is perfect for our aims. The union's researchers will be most pleased.
For the betterment of the union!
